墯字的基本解释

墯
duò
古同“堕”。
古通“惰”。

墯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［duò］
［《廣韻》徒果切，上果，定。］
［《廣韻》他果切，上果，透。］
亦作“墯1”。“堕1”的繁体字。亦作“1”。
(1)落；落下。
(2)脱落。
(3)通“惰”。懈怠；懒散。
(4)犹垛。
[②]［huī］
［《廣韻》許規切，平支，曉。］
“堕2”的繁体字。
(1)荒废；废弃。
(2)损毁；败坏。
(3)输，送。

墯字的康熙字典解释
墯字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
墯字的起名意思

暂无。

墯
Basic explanation of words
墯
duò
Gu Tong "fallen."
Gutong is "lazy".
墯
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［duò］
["Guangyun" cut the fruit, set the fruit, set it. ]
["Guangyun" He cuts, puts on the fruit, and sees through. ]
Also known as "墯1". Traditional Chinese characters for "depraved 1". Also known as "1".
(1) Falling; falling.
(2) Falling off.
(3) Through "laziness". Laziness; laziness.
(4) Still duo.
[②]［huī］
["Guangyun" Xu Guiqie, Pingzhi, Xiao. ]
Traditional Chinese characters for "落2".
(1) Wasted; abandoned.
(2) Damage; corruption.
(3) Lose, send.
